devdoc.details: In the beginning there was a smart contract...

approveDeployer(uint256,address,bool,byt.details: Approve or disapprove a deployer using multi-signature verification.

params.newDeployer: The address of the deployer to approve or disapprove

constructor.details: Sets the initial deployers as approved upon contract creation.

deploy(uint256,bytes12,bytes20,bytes,byt.details: Deploy a contract using the EIP-1014 (create2) opcode for deterministic addresses.

params.chainId: The chain on which to deploy
params.initCode: The initialization code for the contract
params.saltHash: A unique salt for contract creation
params.secret: A secret part of the salt
params.sourceCode: The bytecode of the contract to deploy

getApproveDeployerNonce().details: Returns the current nonce for deployer approvals.

getEthSignedMessageHash(bytes32).details: Recreates the Ethereum signed message hash from the plain message hash.

params._messageHash: The hash of the original message

getMessageHash(uint256,address,bool).details: Generates a hash of the message containing nonce, deployer address, and approval status.

params.newDeployer: Address of the deployer in the message

getVersion().details: Returns the version number of the Genesis contract

isApprovedDeployer(address).details: Check if an address is an approved deployer.

recoverSigner(uint256,address,bool,bytes.details: Recovers the signer from the signature.

params.newDeployer: Address of the deployer in the message

devdoc.title: HOLOGRAPH GENESIS
